thread.title: Fire burns for hours at Bothell topsoil business
thread.title_full: Fire burns for hours at Bothell topsoil business | www.kirotv.com

author: kirotv.com
title: Fire burns for hours at Bothell topsoil business
text:
People in a Bothell neighborhood say they've been smelling smoke for the last eight hours from up to a mile away.
The fire along 228th Street Southwest at 14th Avenue West has been burning at a sand and topsoil business since 9 p.m. Sunday.
Monday morning, a faint glow could still be seen at Fruehling Sand and Topsoil.
Part of 228th is closed because of a fire hose connected to a hydrant is in the street. The hydrant is the closest one available.
The fire is likely burning in a mulch pit of some sort.
KIRO 7â€™s Nick McGurk is following the story during our morning news. Watch live: http://kiro.tv/LiveNews
